answers.answer: I went through the sweets thing early on in my pregnancy(week 9-13) but i tried to force other stuff because we have to worry about gestinal diabetes or however you spell it lol. Fruit helped me for some reason

Ya I try to make it as small as possible but it helps make me feel so much better. I'm around 9 weeks myself ☺ I try eating bread and soup that's all I can really keep down and feel better with right now.
Lol try cocoa pebbles and fruity pebbles they worked for me, i could keep them down and another mom on here could too lol they are sweet but not cookies and cupcakes sweet:) good luck:)
Fruity pebbles sound really good right now

question: This baby won't let me eat anything really except cupcakes and cookies. Anyone else feel like there baby is going to make them fat from the sweets lol
title: holy sweets
